Missouri: s participation in the pilot program of the Excellence in Mental Health Act, which demonstrates a commitment to improving mental and behavioral health services.
Testimonials from experts and profession: such as Debra Walker and Brent McGinty, who affirm that Missouri is a national leader in expanding mental and behavioral health services.
The endorsement and advocacy of Missouri: Roy Blunt, who has been actively working to expand access to mental and behavioral health care and believes it should be treated on par with physical health.
